revised_title: Case Study: Convulsive Fits Cured by Discharge of Worms
tldr: A case study of a boy with convulsive fits caused by a worm infestation. The boy was treated with a mixture of white lead, lampblack, and linseed oil, which resulted in the discharge of numerous worms and a subsequent cure. The boy's physical and mental health improved significantly after the treatment, and his family members also experienced similar symptoms, suggesting a possible hereditary aspect to the condition.
